title: Major Frame Drop on Butcher's Bridge
body:
I was playing on the new map, trying to do the Graves quest, and suddenly, 1 FPS. It was not because of my computer since the mouse was moving perfectly  (or at least that's what I think). Because of the anti-leave blocks it blocked my PC (I mean the pop-up that blocks you from alt+f4 and clontrol pannel).
I was playing Miss Fortune if that helps somehow.
Update: I just played a game and asked players if they knew about it and one responed that I should Turn of sounds, and it worked
Update 2: Other summones have been typing in chat on butcher's bridge that they have really low FPS, but I don't know If they could turn the sounds down because when I played I could barrely open the menu and then I couldn't close it. I hope Riot Fixes it

replies.body:
Hey guys,

Sorry to hear you're having performance issues. :(

Would you be able to provide any information, so we could investigate this?

Specifically, things that would be good to have is:

* DXDiag of your machine
* A copy of your game.cfg file from your League of Legends folder. (C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config)

Additionally, some good troubleshooting steps could be:

* Updating your drivers to the newest version
* Deleting your game.cfg (C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config) (if you're on Mac, this file path will be different)
** Note, this will reset your settings to default values.
* Deleting your input.ini file (C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config) (if you're on Mac, this file path will be different)

Any information you could provide would be very helpful :) We are actively investigating performance issues being reported by players.
